channel.title: Evry on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Evry on vNinja.net

item.title: I Made Something Happen
item.description:
I think Seth Godin might have been onto something with «Make something happen», so I did.

Today was my last day at EVRY. Some might already have been aware of this, mostly because of Hoff-Job-Announcement-as-a-Service, but also because of my own tweet as I left the EVRY offices in Bergen Â as an employee for the last time:

item.title: What if it's Just Some Crazy Guy in a Clown Suit?
item.description:
As a few of you have noticed, I recently changed my title on LinkedIn from Chief Consultant to Cloud Architect in the newly formed EVRY Cloud Consulting division, but what does that mean and perhaps more importantly, why?

The closest description I have found to describe what my new role is this:
